item.title: Summit Therapeutics Inc 10-K
item.description: Summit Therapeutics Inc, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 17, 2022 had 55242 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 632 instances product - 550 instances clinical - 490 instances company - 469 instances development - 383 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
